places.name: Kvartal
places.reviews_summary: The reviews highlight that the store is a 24-hour minimarket, making it a convenient option for late-night needs. While it offers a decent selection of basic items and alcohol, some customers note that the prices are on the higher side and the product variety is limited. It is described as an "emergency" place for quick grocery runs, but overall, it is considered just an ordinary grocery market. Despite its limitations, the store serves its purpose for those in need of essentials at any hour.

reviews.text: 24 hour store. Very decent selection for location and size. Get your basics and your beer.
reviews.original_text: 24 hour store. Very decent selection for location and size. Get your basics and your beer.

reviews.text: Minimarket, open 24H, the prices are high and not lot of products available
reviews.original_text: Minimarket, open 24H, the prices are high and not lot of products available

reviews.text: 24/7 with alcohol sold around the clock. An "emergency" place ;)
reviews.original_text: 24/7 with alcohol sold around the clock. An "emergency" place ;)

reviews.text: 24/7 convenient grocery
Just ordinary grocery market

places.name: –ö—É–ª–∏–Ω–∏—á–∏
places.reviews_summary: The reviews indicate a strong dissatisfaction with the establishment, primarily due to the rude behavior of the sales staff. Customers have reported that the seller is often absent, taking extended breaks, which adds to the frustration. Additionally, there are complaints about technical issues occurring shortly after the establishment's opening. Overall, the negative experiences have led to a desire for significant changes in staff and service quality.

places.name: –ú–ê–ì–ê–ó–ò–ù –ß–ü –≠–†–ê–ö
places.reviews_summary: The reviews highlight a mix-up regarding store locations, with one reviewer expressing satisfaction with the service at Schekavitskaya 45, while criticizing the rudeness of staff at the nearby store on Shchekavitskaya 49. Customers appreciate the variety and quality of products available, noting that the store offers fresh fruits and vegetables, baked goods, and a wide range of household items at reasonable prices. The friendly and helpful staff are frequently mentioned as a positive aspect of the shopping experience. Overall, the store is described as a reliable local option for essential groceries and household supplies.

reviews.text: Yes, you're right. I got the wrong store. Everyone in this store is responsive and very positive.) And in that other store with a short haircut, the woman is a shepherdüòÇ

Dear Maxim! You must have mixed up the store, I go here all the time, I am very satisfied (Schekavitskaya 45), but the new one on Shchekavitskaya 49, yes, the service is lower than 1, and the saleswoman there with a short haircut is very rude in service
There is everything you need at reasonable prices. Vegetables and fruits are always fresh and tasty. There are pastries. Friendly sellers will be able to advise and help you choose.

An old store with the local name "Bell" and a strong assortment: basic vegetables, fruits, sausages, frozen foods, cakes, sweets, cookies, bread, alcohol, juices, water; household products: household chemicals, hygiene products... Everything that might unexpectedly run out at home is here, prices are moderate.
Supper

places.reviews_span: latest date: 2024-11-07, most recent date: 2020-10-22, date difference: 1477 days

places.name: –ö–æ–ª–æ
places.reviews_summary: The reviews highlight a mix of experiences at a local grocery store. While some customers appreciate the convenience and friendly staff, others express frustration with specific incidents, such as a refusal to exchange expired milk and a lack of enforcement of mask-wearing among customers. The store is noted for its cleanliness and organization, with a decent selection of products, including popular items like paninis and good coffee. Overall, it serves as a handy option for quick purchases, though improvements in customer service and adherence to health guidelines are suggested.

reviews.text:
The child went in the evening at 9:00 p.m. to buy milk at the nearest store at home. But after paying, I saw that the expiration date is today. I turned to the cashier to exchange for a fresher product, because we are physically unable to drink everything today. The cashier refused (!!!) the child and stated that there is no reason to exchange milk for fresh! Because if you didn't notice when you took it, it's already too late.
The child came very upset. I had to get dressed and go. The seller also charged me precisely about the lack of grounds. I had to explain that the buyer's desire and the receipt in hand is all that is needed for the product group to exchange the product immediately at the first request.
Dear "KOLO", educate your sellers about the laws of Ukraine and, above all, politeness. Even if the child was wrong, you can't behave like that.

A small grocery store for those who don‚Äôt want to run far. Of course, you can‚Äôt make purchases for the week, but going out to buy bread is just the thing. Prices are above average, but not astronomical. There are delicious paninis on sale, but they sell out pretty quickly. The staff are very courteous and friendly.

The staff is friendly. BUT. Only the seller knows that it is necessary to wear a mask in the store. Customers are angry and don't wear masks (the store is full of customers without masks), and the cashier lets go of the goods without comment. I understand that you need to make a cash register, but you still need to respect other customers as well.

Trade in this minimarket is very well organized. The goods are laid out as conveniently as possible, clean, but if you add the friendliness of the sellers and normal coffee, then in general it‚Äôs a normal store üòÄ
An excellent grocery store that lives up to its name: groceries near your home. Good coffee, reasonable prices. There is everything you need if you really need it urgently.

places.reviews_span: latest date: 2023-07-13, most recent date: 2020-07-07, date difference: 1101 days

places.name: Silpo
places.reviews_summary: The reviews highlight a mix of experiences at the supermarket, with some praising its impressive interior design and wide selection of products, particularly for vegetarians and vegans. However, there are complaints about high prices and inconsistent service, especially in the sweets department where customers often wait for assistance. While some shoppers appreciate the quality of ingredients and the tasty, affordable pizza, others express frustration over the availability of certain items, like minced meat, especially during late hours. Overall, the supermarket is regarded as one of the best in Ukraine, despite its higher prices compared to competitors.

reviews.text: Good market, with cool staff and without queues. But, I give only one star, because in department where sells sweets always absent seller!!!! Always wait they during 15 minutes, or have to find somebody to serve me. Do you think it is normal service???
reviews.original_text: Good market, with cool staff and without queues. But, I give only one star, because in department where sells sweets always absent seller!!!! Always wait they during 15 minutes, or have to find somebody to serve me. Do you think it is normal service???

reviews.text: A huge supermarket. Some positions here are a bit overpriced, the location is pretty good. There is a wide variety of products for vegetarians/vegans, pricetags are depressing though. They also make tasty and cheap pizza
reviews.original_text: A huge supermarket. Some positions here are a bit overpriced, the location is pretty good. There is a wide variety of products for vegetarians/vegans, pricetags are depressing though. They also make tasty and cheap pizza

reviews.text: Amazing interior design with an ode to historic Podil. Akin to an art exhibition. Outstanding selection of produce and products. Excellent food hall. Prices more expensive than regular Silpos. Could be considered a second tier Silpo, after Le Silpo.
reviews.original_text: Amazing interior design with an ode to historic Podil. Akin to an art exhibition. Outstanding selection of produce and products. Excellent food hall. Prices more expensive than regular Silpos. Could be considered a second tier Silpo, after Le Silpo.

reviews.text: Couldn't find minced meat, or maybe it's because I went there past 9pm other than that, it's a good one stop shop
reviews.original_text: Couldn't find minced meat, or maybe it's because I went there past 9pm other than that, it's a good one stop shop

reviews.text: One of the best supermarkets in ukraine. Quality ingredients and good service but its just more expensive than any other store but its still one of the best.
reviews.original_text: One of the best supermarkets in ukraine. Quality ingredients and good service but its just more expensive than any other store but its still one of the best.

places.reviews_span: latest date: 2021-10-25, most recent date: 2020-07-26, date difference: 456 days

places.name: La Gazza Delicatezze
places.reviews_summary: The grocery store is praised for its amazing service and a delightful selection of high-quality foods, including Italian ham and cheese, Western European sweets, and Ukrainian ready-meals. However, there are serious concerns about food safety, as some customers reported purchasing spoiled meat products that led to food poisoning, along with experiences of rude staff. Despite these issues, many families consider it their favorite store, particularly for its excellent coffee, olives, cheeses, and jamon, with some highlighting its resilience during challenging times in Kyiv. Overall, while the store has a loyal customer base that appreciates its offerings, the inconsistency in product quality and service remains a significant concern.

reviews.text: An amazing service and a pleasent assortment of high quality foods like ham and cheese from Italy, sweets from Western Europe and even ready-meals made in Ukraine meet you in this family owned classic grocery store.
reviews.original_text: An amazing service and a pleasent assortment of high quality foods like ham and cheese from Italy, sweets from Western Europe and even ready-meals made in Ukraine meet you in this family owned classic grocery store.

reviews.text: They sell spoiled products, we got poisoned by meat products bought from them, very rude staff.
reviews.original_text: They sell spoiled products, we got poisoned by meat products bought from them, very rude staff.

reviews.text: Great selection of Italian products, the biggest portions of Rio tuna in town!
reviews.original_text: Great selection of Italian products, the biggest portions of Rio tuna in town!

reviews.text: Favorite store and coffee shop of our family and especially children! The best coffee, olives, cheeses and jamon! The only store in Podil that did not close during the most difficult times of Kyiv in 2022 and was concerned about all the residents around ü•∞
My family's favorite store. The most delicious coffee in Podil. Friendly staff.

places.name: Natur Boutique - Organic shop of products
places.reviews_summary: The reviews highlight a welcoming atmosphere with friendly staff and a focus on healthy, organic products. Customers appreciate the variety of natural goods available, including food, drinks, teas, and cosmetics. Many express satisfaction with the quality of the offerings and the overall cozy environment of the store. Additionally, the presence of a beauty and health studio adds to the appeal, providing services like hair removal and cosmetic consultations.

reviews.text: Friendly personnel, healthy food, tasty drinks and a wide variety everyday household things.
reviews.original_text: Friendly personnel, healthy food, tasty drinks and a wide variety everyday household things.

reviews.text: Good organic products shop
Healthy food,  natural goods
A cozy store, many natural, various teas, there are cosmetics. I haven't been in for a long time and was pleasantly surprised)

Paradise organic place of Beauty and Health. This is excellent! Thanks for the Organic Products!!! And for the Beauty and Health Studio, there you can do hair removal, makeup, visit a cosmetologist and a doctor! Complete set :)

places.name: –•–ª—ñ–±–∞—Ä
places.reviews_summary: Customers have praised the fantastic atmosphere and delicious offerings at Hlibar, particularly highlighting the tasty vegetarian quiche and a great selection of cakes and pastries. Many reviewers appreciate the friendly staff and the pleasant service, with one noting the quick service despite a long line. However, some have expressed frustration with the wait times, especially when it seems that police officers are prioritized over regular customers. Overall, Hlibar is seen as a charming spot in Podil, but potential visitors should be prepared for possible delays.

reviews.text:
Thank you so much for the fantastic atmosphere, tasty vegetarian quiche and a great selection of delicious cakes and pastries! Now Hlibar is one of my favourite places in Podil)
With love from France,
Marie
